name: PAB-1 Core Purple
description:
Item Type: Light Armor
Damage Reduction: 20%
Carrying Capacity: 4K µSCU
Temp. Rating: -40 / 70 °C
Backpack Compatibility: Light
Clark Defense Systems built the PAB-1 light but strong enough to stay in a fight. The first CDS suit to utilize their proprietary nano-weave, this light armor became a favorite of those who needed a little extra protection while remaining agile.
description_cn:
物品类型：轻型装甲
伤害减免：20%
储物空间：4K µSCU
适用温度：-40 / 70 °C
可挂载背包类型：轻型
卡拉克防御系统将PAB-1设计成了轻量但却足以支撑战斗的护甲。作为第一件运用了CDS专有纳米编织技术的护甲，它成为了那些需要一点点额外防护同时又要保持敏捷之人的最爱。
